title: Is it really worth using Google Docs? - Quora

response.answer_text: It depends if you do not have ms office then insted of installing you can use google docs. Or if your pc space / memory is limited then it is good to go with google docs. Google docs offers some features which are very good. Like editing at same time using collab. Sharing. Keeping version control etc
It's not necessary. Unless you are on the move often and have a team or staff who may need to access the documents.
